question: Gandhi Sagar Dam is a part of which one of the following?
explanation: Gandhi Sagar Dam is a part of the Chambal project. The Gandhi Sagar dam is one of the four dams built on the Chambal river. Other three dams are Rana Pratap Sagar dam, Jawahar Sagar dam and Kota Barrage. The dam is located in Mandsaur district of the state of Madhya Pradesh.
